title: Upcoming Events | website

textBlocks.html: Madison Arcatao Sister City Project

textBlocks.text:
Two fair trade festivals are coming up soon in Madison!

 



November 19 at the Orchard Ridge United Church of Christ (ORUCC), 1502 Gilbert Road, 9 AM-2 PM


December 2 at Monona Terrace, 9AM-4 PM



These are great places to buy fairly traded gifts and unique items from all over the world. Please come by the MASCP table to say hello and to see beautiful new items from Arcatao!

textBlocks.text:
Volunteer at the Fair Trade Holiday Festival!

 

You are warmly invited to help MASCP by signing up for a two hour shift at the Fair Trade Holiday Festival at Monona Terrace on Dec 2. It’s not hard and lots of  fun! You’ll be partnered with an active member of MASCP and help with selling items from Arcatao. We guarantee you’ll end up learning more about MASCP; you’ll meet interesting people and get to visit with old friends who come by. We’d be grateful for your help!
